name: One Button Gets You There
description:
This is a very quick game I made for 1-Button Game Jam.

You're on your way to work, riding an electric skateboard with one wheel. Using only one button (or touch/tap!) you are able to lean forward and backward to keep your balance and maintain a healthy speed. Keeping your balance arrow in the green area maximizes your speed (distance traveled, score).

Over time the amount of effort it takes to keep balanced starts to weaken your legs and it gets tougher and tougher to maintain balance.

How far can you get with one wheel and one button?
